about_the_game: Experience the magical music of Hinterberg with the official soundtrack! Written exclusively for Dungeons of Hinterberg by Wobblersound, this album will take you on an audible journey through Hinterberg. Experience the highs and lows of an adventurer, with epic battle music, soothing relaxation beats, and some classic euro dance vibes.
detailed_description: Experience the magical music of Hinterberg with the official soundtrack!
